title: Blue Vinyl
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225533/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225533/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Blue Vinyl**

[Blue Vinyl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225533/http:/www.bvfonts.com/) is a foundry created by type designer [Jess Latham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225533/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jess%20Latham) in 1997.
author: bvfonts
